item.title: The Unusual Suspect | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, investigators question if there is a serial killer in a suburb of Maryland when two mothers and their teenage daughters are murdered. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 23, 2015. Transcript

item.title: Family Secrets | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a father and his sons have a dream to build an extreme sports theme park. But reality hits when the dad is found dead on the floor of their Skim-X warehouse. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on September 16, 2016. Transcript

item.title: Final Curtain | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, Rachel Buffett speaks to Dateline about being at the center of a murder investigation involving both her former fiancée and her friend, a 26-year-old Army veteran. Josh Mankiewicz reports on the details of the gripping and twisted case that made international headlines. Originally aired on NBC on November 30, 2018. Transcript

item.title: The Devil Was Watching | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description When Tina Sandoval disappears, her parents and loved ones spend years searching for any signs of her. Law enforcement is convinced she is the victim of foul play, but the prosecution has a problem. How can they convince a jury that she was murdered if there is no body, no crime scene and no physical evidence? Meanwhile, Tina was keeping a dark secret, one that might lead to clues about what happened to her.

item.title: Smoke and Mirrors | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, when a Chicago pharmaceutical representative stops returning calls, her large and loving family begin to worry. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 18, 2016. Transcript

item.title: The Knock at the Door | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, the case of a young woman found murdered turns cold soon after she is found. Will her mother’s search for answers bring justice? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 7, 2017. Transcript

item.title: In a Lonely Place - Update | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description When California entrepreneur Chris Smith is murdered, his family is shocked. They had believed he had sold his company, broken up with this girlfriend and was traveling the world with a Playboy Playmate. In a December 6, 2019 update, the man convicted of his murder speaks with Keith Morrison. Transcript

item.title: Tangled Web | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, investigators discover a twisted tale of secrets, lies and infidelity after a beloved firefighter is murdered just outside Sarasota, Florida. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 5, 2016. Transcript

item.title: Deadly Intent | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a car bomb explodes in front of a suburban San Diego day care home. Josh Mankiewicz reports on the driver, a married mother of three children. Originally aired on NBC on October 4, 2013. Transcript

item.title: While They Were Sleeping | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, Melissa Oxley wakes up to find her husband, Ben Oxley, shot in the head next to her. No one in the house sees or hears anything. Who could have committed this brutal murder? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC May 4, 2012. Transcript

item.title: The House in the Woods | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a former hockey player discovers his wife murdered in their own home. His young daughter says she saw a robber, but the killer’s true identity turns out to be far more complicated. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 24, 2017. Transcript

item.title: At the Bottom of the Lake | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a pilot flees after a deadly plane crash, and becomes a fugitive living a double life for decades. He tells his story to Keith Morrison. Originally aired on NBC on October 12, 2018. Transcript

item.title: Secrets & Lies | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a woman is found dead in the debris of her house that burned to the ground early one frigid morning in a small rural New York town. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 6, 2013. Transcript

item.title: The Black Widow of Lomita | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description A California woman’s two former husbands are mysteriously murdered, nearly 20 years apart. She becomes known as the “Black Widow of Lomita” and is able to elude police, until fate catches up with her. Keith Morrison reports from the Philippines on this international story which features the sister of one of the victims who never stopped fighting to learn what really happened to her brother. Originally aired on NBC on November 8, 2019.

item.title: Obsession | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a young Wisconsin college student with a passion for music is mysteriously found dead in her bed, but it’s another woman’s unbelievable courage that ultimately leads police to her killer. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 30, 2015. Transcript

item.title: Consumed | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a home in Kentucky is ravaged by fire in the middle of the night. Firefighters work their way to the master bedroom where they make a grisly discovery. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 8, 2016. Transcript

item.title: The Box | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description Years after a Montana man is found dead, his son dreads what he’ll find when he opens up the box of case files, giving him insight into what really happened. Keith Morrison reports on his journey and the murder investigation that unraveled a revenge plot. Originally aired on NBC on October 25, 2019. Transcript

item.title: The Halloween Party | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, detectives settle in for a long investigation while a Michigan town searches for clues when one of their residents goes missing from a Halloween party. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 27, 2017. Transcript

item.title: Shining Star | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, an up-and-coming Baton Rouge defense attorney is found dead in her office after a long night at work. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 17, 2015. Transcript

item.title: The Pink Skirt Plot | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description The murder of a young businessman in Old San Juan, Puerto Rico marks the start of a 15-year-long hunt to find the killer. As his devoted father’s quest for justice uncovers secrets and spans continents, the FBI begins an international game of cat and mouse to catch those responsible for his son’s murder. Natalie Morales reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 18, 2019. Transcript

item.title: The House on Badger Lane | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, the three young children of a couple who live in a gated community in California hear a thump one morning that becomes the first clue in a mystery that will expose family secrets. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 31, 2016. Transcript

item.title: Something Sweet | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a retired corrections officer mysteriously dies from antifreeze poisoning in rural Ohio. Detectives uncover multiple suspects during a five-year investigation that causes two families to collide. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on December 11, 2015. Transcript

item.title: The Devil in Disguise | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, an ex-Navy man marries the love of his life. Five months later, his new bride finds him dead on their bedroom floor leaving family and authorities puzzled. Who would want him dead? Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 12, 2015. Transcript

item.title: The Plan | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description A double homicide in upstate New York leads detectives on a cross country investigation to piece together a case with a surprising suspect at the center. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 11, 2019. Transcript

item.title: A Crack in Everything | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, when a woman is found dead in her home, it’s ruled a suicide. But when a new investigation begins, police question if this is a murder case. Will the truth be revealed? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 30, 2018. Transcript

item.title: Haunted | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description Nearly 10 years after Utah mother Susan Powell vanished, private journals, home videos and emails shed new light on what happened to her. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 4, 2019. Transcript

item.title: The Thing About Pam | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description The unbelievable story of how the murder of one woman, Betsy Faria, set off a chain of events leaving one man dead, another man implicated and a diabolical scheme exposed. Keith Morrison unravels the latest chapter, including why Betsy’s friend, Pam Hupp, impersonated a real-life Dateline producer. Listen in conjunction with the hit 6-episode behind-the-scenes podcast of the same name. Originally aired on NBC on September 27, 2019.

item.title: Finding Venus | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description A mother of two mysteriously vanishes from her parents’ home in Michigan while going to check the mailbox, leaving her phone and identification behind. Police declare her dead before they even find her body. The disappearance and complicated investigation takes years for detectives to unravel. Dennis Murphy reports on the most recent developments in the case. Originally aired on NBC on January 20, 2019. Transcript

item.title: The Creek | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, Danielle Locklear, a popular and charismatic high school freshman leaves home to drop off a notebook at her classmate’s house and never returns. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 4, 2018. Transcript

item.title: The Watcher | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a recent law school graduate in Georgia with a promising future disappears without a trace. What could have happened? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 8, 2018. Transcript

item.title: The Match | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, a high school girl, who was nearly beaten to death in her own home, goes under hypnosis in an attempt to identify her attacker. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on September 7, 2018. Transcript

item.title: A Deal with the Devil | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, Keith Morrison reports on a notorious serial killer, nicknamed Hannibal, who murdered several people while working as a confidential informant for the FBI. The two-hour broadcast tells the inside story of how he was ultimately caught. Originally aired on NBC on September 21, 2018. Transcript

item.title: Under the Desert Sky | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, the murder of a Nevada teenager shakes the community to its core when the two most unlikely people make a shocking confession. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 4, 2013. Transcript

item.title: Secrets of the Desert | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, the mystery surrounding the deaths of three women deep in the Sonoran desert takes 17 years to untangle, and is only solved when a fourth woman comes forward with the truth. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 19, 2017. Transcript

item.title: Twisted in Texas | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description In this Dateline classic, when one woman breaks off her relationship with a boyfriend she says abused and stalked her, he goes on to something even worse. His accused accomplice? His new girlfriend. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 29, 2018. Transcript

item.title: 11 Minutes | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description The father of an Alabama teenager calls the police after he returns home to find his son had thrown a party, leaving the place trashed. Just 11 minutes after the deputy leaves their house, there is another 911 call placed. What could have happened? Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 19, 2019. Transcript

item.title: Into the Night | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description The disappearance of a young woman from Bend, Oregon leads to an intense manhunt after the suspect sets off on a two state crime spree. Keith Morrison reports on the latest updates in the case. Originally aired on NBC on May 19, 2019. Transcript

item.title: The Betrayal of Sarah Stern | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description The discovery of a nineteen-year-old’s car abandoned on a bridge in New Jersey turns into a missing person case that evolves into a months-long homicide investigation. As the case tears apart a Jersey Shore town, police discover a plot involving money, close friends and a fatal betrayal. Keith Morrison reports on the investigation and the extraordinary undercover video that helped solve the crimes. Originally aired on NBC on May 17, 2019.

item.title: She Didn't Come Home | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description A mother in Pennsylvania disappears one afternoon after she is last seen by her co-workers leaving for lunch. The case remains cold even after 60 investigators try to crack it. Could the 61st detective finally have the answers? Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally Aired on NBC on April 26, 2019. Transcript

item.title: Introducing Dateline NBC | Dateline NBC
item.description: Podcast Description Current and classic episodes of Dateline NBC, featuring compelling true-crime mysteries, powerful documentaries and in-depth investigations. Transcript
